title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: Please note that this Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of Sportsbet.io sponsored Football Pools @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461024.0Premier LeagueLa LigaSerie A Bundesliga Tuesday, 7 November  Champions League- Group stage 4Prediction Contest!Oddshttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/uefa-champions-league/borussia-dortmund-v-newcastle-united-6539ff8cb3c6960001db1f52Rulesa.  Predict the winner (1x2) (Dortmund, Newcastle or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)b.  Predict the Final score (1x2)  (must get correct to proceed)c.  First team to score? (Dortmund, Newcastle or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)d.  Most corners? (Dortmund, Newcastle or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)e.  Goals scored in both halves? (Yes or No)   (must get correct to proceed)f.  Team to receive most cards? (Dortmund, Newcastle or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)g. Team with highest possession %? (Dortmund, Newcastle or Draw) (must get correct to proceed)h.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)Examplea. Newcastleb. 2-1c. Dortmundd. Newcastlee. Yes  f. Sameg. Dortmundh. 25'Prizes1st place:  3 mBTC Free Bet + Southampton shirt 2nd place:  2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place:  1 mBTC Free Bet* Limit one (1) Southampton shirt per person/season *(Small print)* Tiebreaker will include a 10 minute handicap for quicker prediction *Example 1:  20' = 20' - 30'Example 2:  50' = 50' - 60'
